# completionCurve

**Instance Property**

Called when the system needs the animation completion curve for an interactive view controller transition.

## Declaration

```swift
@MainActor optional var completionCurve: UIView.AnimationCurve { get }
```

## Return Value

Default value is [doc://com.apple.uikit/documentation/UIKit/UIView/AnimationCurve/easeInOut], with other possible values described in the [doc://com.apple.uikit/documentation/UIKit/UIView/AnimationCurve] type definition.

## Providing a transition’s completion characteristics

- **completionSpeed**: Called when the system needs the speed at which to complete an interactive transition, after the interactive portion is finished.
